column1:
share on x nn nelson johnson ( bonnie brown's nephew)jun 16 at 5:24 am nelson johnson ( bonnie brown's nephew) purchased the violets and butterflies for the family of mrs. bonnie lee (nelson) brown. share on x js janice davis shelton. jun 15 at 2:05 pm i always looked forward to seeing her smiling face at the hospital when any of my family members were there. she was such a sweet lady. my mother was doris sapp davis, bonnie's first cousin. janice davis shelton. madison, nccomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dm donna beth mc. neilljun 14 at 5:14 pm kelli & family, i am so sorry to hear about the loss of your momma. there is nothing i can say to ease the pain you are suffering. just know god is with you during this time. keeping yall in my prayers now and in the months ahead!! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ds dawn shaw. jun 12 at 3:42 pm bonnie was a wonderful woman and a hard worker. she will be missed greatly. went i did my phlebotomy clinical and later worked at high point regional she was my mentor. i will miss you bonnie. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 14. 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm cumby family funeral service - high point1015 eastchester drive. high point, nc, us, 27262. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. service. jun 15. 2:00 pm cumby family funeral service - high point1015 eastchester drive. high point, nc, us, 27262. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe cumby family funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
